trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The wandering Loporrit is looking for “work.”
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the hamlet resident.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_TODO_01<tab>Place the bags of beast repellent at the designated locations.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the hamlet resident.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the wandering Loporrit.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_000<tab>Haven't we met before? You're...one of Urianger's friends, yes?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_001<tab>Ah, I thought so! I'm here wandering around Labyrinthos, hoping to find some “work” to do. It sounds like such fun!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_002<tab>But I don't even know where to start or how to ask for it. Can you help me?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_A1_000_001<tab>Of course!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_A1_000_002<tab>I suppose...
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_003<tab>Well then, what are we waiting for!? Let's find someone with “work” for me!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_005<tab>Perhaps this person can help us!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_010<tab>Is there something I can help you and your...uh...friend with?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_011<tab>Hm, I'd heard Loporrits were interested in learning about our culture. And you're saying this one is looking for a job...?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_012<tab>Yes, I would like to “work” at a “job”! Do you know of one I could do?

TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_013<tab>Well, most people here work at Aporia or Thaumazein, but we would need to submit documents to request the proper level of clearance and─ Oh! I have an idea!

TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_014<tab>As you've seen, the man-made habitats hereabouts are populated by a variety of experimental subjects. Some of the bolder beasts, however, have been known to cause unfortunate incidents in and around the elemental reactors.

TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_015<tab>In order to encourage these creatures to keep their distance, we've put together some bags of noxious-smelling repellent. I'd appreciate it if you could place a few of them by the reactors themselves.

TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_016<tab>For now, I need you to ward two such facilities: the one to the south, and the one to the west of Logistikon Beta. Here, there's an armful for each of you so you can split the work.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_017<tab>Oh. I'm sorry for making you “work,” too. But that means we can share the payment as well!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_018<tab>Right! I'll go to the south reactor, and you take the one in the west. Work, work, work...
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_025<tab>Go ahead and place a few of those bags by the reactor west of Logistikon Beta.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_030<tab>I'm all done! Would you mind making a report to our employer?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_040<tab>Thank you both for your cooperation. I'll hand the payment to our lunar friend here so that she might have the full “job” experience.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_RESEARCHER04321_000_041<tab>Oh, and I'll throw in some apples from Meryall Agronomics, too. Enjoy!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_042<tab>Oh, a new food to try! Let's head back up the stairs and eat them together!
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_050<tab>Time to munch on these “apples”! They look delicious, don't they?
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_051<tab>Oh my... They don't just look delicious, they <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> delicious! They might be even better than carrots...
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_052<tab>I thought this place would be just like Mare Lamentorum since it's all artificial, but I'm glad I was wrong.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_053<tab>I was wrong about a lot, even after everything Urianger told me to expect. And I learned so much at my “job”! I think I want to try another one.
TEXT_AKTKZI006_04321_LOPORRIT04321_000_054<tab>Oh, before I forget, here's your share of our payment. Thank you for all your help!
